title: Dr. Dmitri Vasin, MD, Nephrology | Silverdale, WA | WebMD

Does Dr. Vasin offer telehealth / virtual visit options? We verify which condition Dr. Dmitri Vasin, MD treats and which conditions they treat most often. We verify which procedures Dr. Dmitri Vasin, MD performs and which procedures they perform most often. Dr. Dmitri Vasin most often treats Chronic Kidney Disease, Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 5, and Kidney Disease. Dr. Dmitri Vasin performs the following procedures most often: Automated Peritoneal Dialysis (APD), Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy (CRRT), and Peritoneal Dialysis. Dr. Dmitri Vasin accepts a wide range of insurance plans, including major providers such as Aetna, Cigna, Humana, Humana, Kaiser Permanente, Medicare, Medicare, and Medicare. Click here to verify if they accept your insurance. Yes, Dr. Dmitri Vasin is currently accepting new patients. Contact the provider via this profile to book an appointment. Dr. Dmitri Vasin earned his medical degree (MD) from First Moscow State Medical University Named After I M Sechenov in 1988. We know that finding the right doctor or provider is important to your health. That√¢s why we want to ensure you have confidence in the provider profiles and listings you see on WebMD Care. Our provider data is sourced from the physicians themselves as well as publicly available databases. Any doctor or provider who claims their profile by verifying themselves can update their information and provide additional data on their specialties, education, accepted insurances, conditions they treat, and procedures they perform. All the physician and provider reviews on WebMD Care are provided by users just like you. Knowing these reviews provide insight into how other patients feel about a doctor, we maintain internal policies and protocols to ensure the quality and accuracy of all reviews. Providers are not able to remove or modify reviews on their own. Reviews can only be removed after an internal review by our customer service team. We value your input and encourage you to reach out to our support team if you encounter any issues.
